caption="Eru Ilúvatar and the Timeless Halls" by Enano Akd

column1: '''The Timeless Halls''' are the dwelling of [[Ilúvatar
column2: Eru]], as distinct from the [[Void]]. They have existed before and outside the boundaries of the [[Eä
column3: universe]], and may or may not have a physical form. Although without limit, they are said to stretch from the [[Abyss]] to the [[Firmament]].
halls]] of [[Manwë]] and [[Varda]] are referred to as "The Timeless Halls."
